analysisPopulations.name: Screened Set
analysisPopulations.text: All participants who signed an informed consent form and check-in to the clinical research unit (CRU) on Day -8 for the Run-in Period.
analysisPopulations.label: Screened Set
analysisPopulations.populationDescription: All participants who signed an informed consent form and check-in to the clinical research unit (CRU) on Day -8 for the Run-in Period.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Signed ICF AND checked into CRU on Day -8

analysisPopulations.name: Enrolled Set
analysisPopulations.text: Participants eligible for the study who are enrolled on Day -7 and initiated on a copper- and molybdenum-controlled diet.
analysisPopulations.label: Enrolled Set
analysisPopulations.populationDescription: Participants eligible for the study who are enrolled on Day -7 and initiated on a copper- and molybdenum-controlled diet.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Eligible AND enrolled on Day -7 AND initiated on controlled diet

analysisPopulations.name: Full Analysis Set
analysisPopulations.text: The primary analysis set used to describe the second and subsequent analysis of interim data from Study ALXN1840-WD-204 to support regulatory submissions, typically including all enrolled participants with Wilson Disease (WD) who receive study treatment.
analysisPopulations.label: FA
analysisPopulations.populationDescription: The primary analysis set used to describe the second and subsequent analysis of interim data from Study ALXN1840-WD-204 to support regulatory submissions, typically including all enrolled participants with Wilson Disease (WD) who receive study treatment.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Enrolled AND diagnosed with Wilson Disease AND treated with ALXN1840

analysisPopulations.name: Per Protocol Set
analysisPopulations.text: A subset of the Full Analysis Set used for sensitivity analyses, requiring a minimum of at least 3 participants for analysis to be performed.
analysisPopulations.label: PP
analysisPopulations.populationDescription: A subset of the Full Analysis Set used for sensitivity analyses, requiring a minimum of at least 3 participants for analysis to be performed.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Subset of FA AND no major protocol deviations AND N >= 3

analysisPopulations.name: Safety Set
analysisPopulations.text: All participants for whom safety data is reviewed by the SRC, including those who receive ALXN1840 doses of 15 mg/day and 30 mg/day.
analysisPopulations.label: Safety Set
analysisPopulations.populationDescription: All participants for whom safety data is reviewed by the SRC, including those who receive ALXN1840 doses of 15 mg/day and 30 mg/day.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Received at least one dose of study drug

analysisPopulations.name: Pharmacokinetic Analysis Set
analysisPopulations.text: Participants who have blood sampling for pharmacokinetic (PK) concentration analyses over the 24-hour dosing period on Days 1, 25, 29, and 39, including pre-dose samples during accumulation and at steady state.
analysisPopulations.label: PK Analysis Set
analysisPopulations.populationDescription: Participants who have blood sampling for pharmacokinetic (PK) concentration analyses over the 24-hour dosing period on Days 1, 25, 29, and 39, including pre-dose samples during accumulation and at steady state.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Received study drug AND has evaluable PK blood samples

analysisPopulations.name: Pharmacodynamic Analysis Set
analysisPopulations.text: Participants who have blood sampling for pharmacodynamic (PD) concentration analyses over the 24-hour dosing period on Days 1, 25, 29, and 39, including assessments of plasma total and labile bound copper (LBC).
analysisPopulations.label: PD Analysis Set
analysisPopulations.populationDescription: Participants who have blood sampling for pharmacodynamic (PD) concentration analyses over the 24-hour dosing period on Days 1, 25, 29, and 39, including assessments of plasma total and labile bound copper (LBC).
analysisPopulations.criteria: Received study drug AND has evaluable PD blood samples

characteristics.name: Wilson Disease History
characteristics.description: History of Wilson Disease (WD) including treatment-experienced and treatment-na√Øve status

characteristics.name: Body Mass Index
characteristics.description: Body mass index calculated at baseline

characteristics.name: Prior WD Medications
characteristics.description: Prior medications used to treat Wilson Disease
